languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт складывает руки в изящном жесте и коротко кивает.{/n} "Хотела бы я поговорить чуть дольше, но Темный город не терпит долгих передышек. Когда ты добыча, загнанная хищниками, нужно оставаться в холодном рассудке и ожидать любых испытаний. Я подготовлюсь к тому, что нас ожидает".

{n}Yrliet makes an elegant gesture and nods curtly.{/n} "I would love to talk for longer, but any respite in the Dark City does not last long. When you are cornered prey, you must remain vigilant and expect to be tested at any moment. I will prepare for what awaits us."
languages.original_text: {n}Ирлиэт складывает руки в изящном жесте и коротко кивает.{/n} "Хотела бы я поговорить чуть дольше, но Темный город не терпит долгих передышек. Когда ты добыча, загнанная хищниками, нужно оставаться в холодном рассудке и ожидать любых испытаний. Я подготовлюсь к тому, что нас ожидает".

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet elegantly gestures her hands and nods curtly.{/n} "I would love to talk for longer, but the Dark City doesn't have the patience for long breaks. When you are the cornered prey, you have to stay vigilant and expect anything. I will get ready for that which awaits us."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet elegantly gestures her hands and nods curtly.{/n} "I would love to talk for longer, but the Dark City doesn't have the patience for long breaks. When you are the cornered prey, you have to stay vigilant and expect anything. I will get ready for that which awaits us."

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特做了个优雅的手势，点了点头。{/n}“我很想和你多聊一会儿，但身处黑暗之城，我们的时间并不多。身为亡命的猎物，我们必须时刻保持警惕，准备迎战。我会为不久之后的战斗做好准备。”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet makes an elegant gesture and nods curtly.{/n} "I would love to talk for longer, but any respite in the Dark City does not last long. When you are cornered prey, you must remain vigilant and expect to be tested at any moment. I will prepare for what awaits us."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特做了个优雅的手势，点了点头。{/n}“我很想和你多聊一会儿，但身处黑暗之城，我们的时间并不多。身为亡命的猎物，我们必须时刻保持警惕，准备迎战。我会为不久之后的战斗做好准备。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet hace un gesto elegante y asiente brevemente.{/n} «Me encantaría seguir hablando, pero en la Ciudad Siniestra ningún descanso es duradero. Una presa acorralada debe permanecer siempre alerta y esperar problemas en todo momento. Me prepararé para lo que nos aguarda».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet makes an elegant gesture and nods curtly.{/n} "I would love to talk for longer, but any respite in the Dark City does not last long. When you are cornered prey, you must remain vigilant and expect to be tested at any moment. I will prepare for what awaits us."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet hace un gesto elegante y asiente brevemente.{/n} «Me encantaría seguir hablando, pero en la Ciudad Siniestra ningún descanso es duradero. Una presa acorralada debe permanecer siempre alerta y esperar problemas en todo momento. Me prepararé para lo que nos aguarda».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet vous adresse un geste élégant et hoche la tête.{/n} « J'aimerais rester discuter avec vous, mais les répits sont toujours de courte durée dans la Cité Crépusculaire. Quand on n'est qu'une proie acculée, il faut rester vigilant et s'attendre à tout. Je vais me préparer pour ce qui nous attend. »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet makes an elegant gesture and nods curtly.{/n} "I would love to talk for longer, but any respite in the Dark City does not last long. When you are cornered prey, you must remain vigilant and expect to be tested at any moment. I will prepare for what awaits us."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet vous adresse un geste élégant et hoche la tête.{/n} « J'aimerais rester discuter avec vous, mais les répits sont toujours de courte durée dans la Cité Crépusculaire. Quand on n'est qu'une proie acculée, il faut rester vigilant et s'attendre à tout. Je vais me préparer pour ce qui nous attend. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet macht eine elegante Geste und nickt höflich.{/n} "Ich würde gerne noch länger reden, aber Ruhe ist in der Dunklen Stadt niemals von Dauer. In die Ecke getriebene Beute muss wachsam bleiben und jede Sekunde mit einem Angriff rechnen. Ich werde mich auf das vorbereiten, was uns erwartet."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet makes an elegant gesture and nods curtly.{/n} "I would love to talk for longer, but any respite in the Dark City does not last long. When you are cornered prey, you must remain vigilant and expect to be tested at any moment. I will prepare for what awaits us."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet macht eine elegante Geste und nickt höflich.{/n} "Ich würde gerne noch länger reden, aber Ruhe ist in der Dunklen Stadt niemals von Dauer. In die Ecke getriebene Beute muss wachsam bleiben und jede Sekunde mit einem Angriff rechnen. Ich werde mich auf das vorbereiten, was uns erwartet."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ユリエットはエレガントなジェスチャーをして、素っ気なくうなずいた。{/n}「もっと長く話したいところだが、仄暗き都での休息は長くは続かない。追い詰められた獲物である以上、警戒を怠らず、いつ試練に見舞われるかわからない。この先待ち受けているものに備えよう」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet makes an elegant gesture and nods curtly.{/n} "I would love to talk for longer, but any respite in the Dark City does not last long. When you are cornered prey, you must remain vigilant and expect to be tested at any moment. I will prepare for what awaits us."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットはエレガントなジェスチャーをして、素っ気なくうなずいた。{/n}「もっと長く話したいところだが、仄暗き都での休息は長くは続かない。追い詰められた獲物である以上、警戒を怠らず、いつ試練に見舞われるかわからない。この先待ち受けているものに備えよう」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, zarif bir hareketle başını eğiyor.{/n} "Daha uzun konuşmak isterdim ama Kara Şehir'de uzun süre dinlenmek imkânsız. Köşeye sıkışmış bir av iken tedbiri elden bırakmamalı, her an sınanmaya hazır olmalısın. Gelecekte bizi bekleyen şeylere hazırlanacağım."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet makes an elegant gesture and nods curtly.{/n} "I would love to talk for longer, but any respite in the Dark City does not last long. When you are cornered prey, you must remain vigilant and expect to be tested at any moment. I will prepare for what awaits us."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet zarif bir hareketle hızla başını eğiyor.{/n} "Daha uzun konuşmak isterdim ama Kara Şehir'de uzun süre dinlenmek imkânsız. Köşeye sıkışmış bir avken tedbirli olmalı ve her an sınanmaya hazır olmalısın. Gelecekte bizi bekleyen sürprizlere hazırlanacağım."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
